thought: To craft a polished_diorite, I need to craft 2 diorite. To craft diorite, I need to place 1 cobblestone and 1 quartz in the crafting table. To get a quartz, I need to smelt the nether_quartz_ore in slot 41. I will smelt it into the first empty slot I find (13).
Ok
act: smelt from slot 41 to slot 13 with quantity 1

Ok
act: move from slot 11 to slot 1 with quantity 1
